description: This intermediate course will take a basic knowledge of InDesign to the next level and will cover customizing defaults and preferences, using styles to refine and speed document production, working with vector objects, advanced importing and techniques for working with text and data. By the end of this course you will be proficient at creating well-organized InDesign documents. You will understand most of the core concepts necessary to prepare for the Adobe Certified Expert exam.
title: Intermediate Adobe InDesign CS6
